definition.name: Post Amazon Cloudwatch Metrics
definition.description: Publishes a metric to Amazon CloudWatch.
definition.author: ROS Tooling Working Group

inputs.name: metric-name
inputs.description: Name of the metric to be published

inputs.name: metric-value
inputs.description:
Value of the metric to be published
true, and false are respectfully converted to 1.0, and 0.0 automatically

inputs.name: metric-dimensions
inputs.description: Dimension of the metric to be published, as a JSON object

inputs.name: metric-data
inputs.description: Path to a JSON file containing CloudWatch-compatible metrics, according to https://awscli.amazonaws.com/v2/documentation/api/latest/reference/cloudwatch/put-metric-data.html If this input is specified, the action will ignore the single-value inputs "metric-name", "metric-value", "metric-dimensions" and only publish the data from this file.

inputs.name: namespace
inputs.description: The namespace for the metric data.

evidence.reasoning: This action is focused on publishing metrics to Amazon CloudWatch, which is primarily a monitoring tool. It also relates to infrastructure as it interacts with AWS services.
